statements: SELECT * FROM web_applications;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM web_applications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM web_applications WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM web_applications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM web_applications WHERE id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM web_applications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM web_applications WHERE id IN (2, 3);
SELECT * FROM web_applications WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, app_name FROM web_applications WHERE app_name LIKE '%web%';
SELECT app_description, created_at FROM web_applications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user;
SELECT username, email FROM user WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM task WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_description, created_at FROM task ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT user.username, task.task_description FROM user INNER JOIN task ON user.user_id = task.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_description, t.status, u.username FROM task t JOIN user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.status = 'Pending';
SELECT u.username, t.task_description, t.status, t.created_at FROM task t JOIN user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, task_description FROM task WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM app_users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM app_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT full_name, address FROM user_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM app_users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, log_message FROM app_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM app_users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, email FROM app_users WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, full_name, address FROM user_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM app_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, email, created_at FROM app_users JOIN app_logs ON app_users.id = app_logs.user_id;
SELECT * FROM dynamic_applications;
SELECT app_name, app_owner, app_created_at FROM dynamic_applications WHERE app_owner = 'Company A';
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM dynamic_applications ORDER BY app_created_at DESC;
SELECT app_name, app_owner, app_updated_at FROM dynamic_applications WHERE app_updated_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT app_name, COUNT(app_id) as total_apps FROM dynamic_applications GROUP BY app_name;
SELECT * FROM dynamic_applications WHERE app_owner = 'John Doe' LIMIT 10;
SELECT app_id, app_name, app_owner FROM dynamic_applications WHERE app_created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY app_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM app_users WHERE user_role = 'admin' AND user_status = 'active';
SELECT session_id, user_id, app_id, session_start, session_end FROM app_sessions WHERE session_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY session_start DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM app_logs WHERE log_type = 'error' AND log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM applications;
SELECT application_name, application_description FROM applications;
SELECT application_id, application_name, application_description FROM applications ORDER BY application_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM applications WHERE application_id = 1;
SELECT application_name, application_description FROM applications WHERE application_id > 2;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%user%';
